p.span: IS UNABLE TO ACCOUNT FOR THIS,

div.p: LET ME GIVE YOU A HYPO

p.span: AFTER THE DEATH OF THE GREEK

div.p: WHY A SIMPLE CUT LIKE THAT
ARE THERE A LOT OF PEOPLE
I WOULD LIKE TO KNOW WHY
THAT I AM THE HEAD OF
I HOPE WE CAN PERSUADE YOU
THE SAME WAY THEY TREAT ME,
THEY EVEN TOLD ME I WAS LUCKY
IT WOULD BE A GOOD IDEA
HELP US GET OUT OF HERE.
THAT EACH ONE HAS HIS OWN
ON HIM AS WELL AS US--
LIKE A BIG BLOB OF NOTHING
ALL I ASK IS ONE THING.
NOW ALL I WANT TO DO
WHEN I WAS SCARED TO DEATH...
AND I WOULD HEAR YOUR VOICE
FROM ALL PARTS OF THE SHIP...
AND YOU HAVE TO TORTURE US
NOT ONLY DO WE HAVE YOUR
I DO NOT WISH TO DIE.
DO YOU WANT TO BE LIKE HIM?
NONE OF US CAN BE TRUSTED.
